text: Hi, would you like to donate to Save the Children?
hello, I have heard of the organization but I am unfamiliar with what they do. what would my donation go toward?
Your donation would help promote children's rights help support children in developing countries. It can really make a difference.
I think I would rather donate to a childrens charity that takes care of American children.
Are American children more important than non-American children?
In the scheme of things, a life is a life, but I am American and feel it important to help my fellow Americans
The children we help are in desperate need, however. Can't you spare even a small donation?
Perhaps I could help out a little. Where are you at?
You can check us out at  URL
are you based in America? are you an American?
We're an international NGO based in the UK.
looking at the link you provided, it appears that children in America also benefit from Save the Children donations. Is that correct?
Ah, so you noticed. ;-)
I hate to be so prejudicial, but I care about the kids around me more than ones I cannot see!
Well, then. You are a scallywag ninny!
I accept that! How much of a donation are you looking for from me?
Well, your donation will be directly deducted from your task payment. You can choose any amount from $0 to all of your payment. Choose all of it!
all of it seems a little steep! I would consider a smaller portion. half would work for me.
Well, it's something. Let's do it, then. Half. Deal?
yes, fifteen cents
At least you\'re "half" decent. ;-)
